There are about 1,500 undocumented people, mostly Mexicans, working on Vermont dairy farms.
And they are, basically, supporting our dairy industry.
And the need was that so many of them were living in the shadows of the barns - really literally.

They relied on volunteers or their employers to get them to medical appointments or shopping and all sorts of things.

- of people in the country illegally; people who have gotten these driver's licenses.
